Configure Project/Promotion Model

Use the Configure Project dialog box (Admin | Configure Project | General tab | Promotion Model) to define a promotion model by defining each promotion group in relation to the next higher group.

Field Descriptions

Promotion Model
Promotion Model Tree Displays the currently defined promotion model.
Add Add promotion groups by doing any of the following:
If there are existing promotion groups, select the group above which you want to add the new group and click Add.

If no promotion groups exist, click Add to define the highest-level group.

To add an additional lowest-level promotion group, select the existing lowest-level group and click Add. Then, you must move the group to make it at the same level as the existing lowest-level group.
Rename Rename any of the promotion groups by selecting the promotion group, clicking Rename, and entering a new name for the promotion group.
Move Move any of the promotion groups by selecting the promotion group, clicking Move, and selecting the new parent promotion group.
Delete Delete any of the promotion groups by selecting the promotion group and clicking Delete. All promotion groups below the deleted group will also be deleted.
